short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prospero lets you add freelance proposal templates instantly from within your Gmail Inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Built by the guys from The nuSchool - Prospero is an automatic proposal creator for freelance creatives.

Prospero for Gmail is a one button extension that will insert a proposal template into your email. All is left for you is to fill in the blanks. 

With Prospero for Gmail you can easily create nice looking proposal templates.
